snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar news. Monday's selection includes items on a TV episode on wind turbine workers, a how a woman got a new jaw that was made with a 3-D printer and the...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar news. Monday's selection includes items on a TV episode on wind turbine workers, a how a woman got a new jaw that was made with a 3-D printer and the fall of the BlackBerry.
lead_paragraph: Here are the interesting things that the tech reporters and editors for The New York Times found on the Web on Monday. Find more Scuttlebot items here.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Wind Turbine TV and 3-D Printer for Body Parts
